member.name: T:BurritoPOS.domain.Burrito
member.summary: This class represents a single delicious Burrito to be part of an Order

Constructor sets burrito options Unique ID of burrito Has flour tortilla Has chili tortilla Has jalapeno cheddar tortilla Has tomato basil tortilla Has herb garlic tortilla Has wheat tortilla Has white rice Has brown rice Has black beans Has pinto beans Has chicken Has beef Has hummus Has pico salsa Has salsa verde Has special salsa Has guacamole Has lettuce Has jalapenos Has tomatoes Has cucumber Has onion Price of burrito
